Package index

Main Interpretation Functions

Core functions for interpreting factor analysis results using LLMs.

interpret_fa()
Interpret Exploratory Factor Analysis Results
chat_fa()
Create Factor Analysis Chat Session
is.chat_fa()
Check if object is a chat_fa
reset.chat_fa()
Reset chat session

S3 Methods for Package Integration

Convenient S3 methods for interpreting results from popular factor analysis packages. Automatically extract loadings and factor correlations from fitted model objects.

interpret()
Interpret Factor Analysis Results Using S3 Methods
interpret(<fa>)
Interpret Results from psych::fa()
interpret(<principal>)
Interpret Results from psych::principal()
interpret(<lavaan>)
Interpret Results from lavaan Models (CFA/SEM)
interpret(<efaList>)
Interpret Results from lavaan::efa()
interpret(<SingleGroupClass>)
Interpret Results from mirt::mirt()

Visualization

Functions for creating visual representations of factor analysis results.

plot(<fa_interpretation>)
Plot Factor Analysis Interpretation Results
create_factor_plot()
Create a visual representation of factor loadings

Export Functions

Export interpretation results to various formats.

export_interpretation()
Export Factor Analysis Interpretation Report

Utility Functions

Helper functions for analyzing factor loading patterns.

find_cross_loadings()
Find Cross-Loading Variables
find_no_loadings()
Find Variables with No Loadings Above Cutoff

Print Methods

S3 methods for displaying interpretation results.

print(<fa_interpretation>)
Print Factor Analysis Interpretation Results
print(<chat_fa>)
Print method for chat_fa objects
